group_1.textCenter: That's right, Iroha... You're in the Rumor of the@1000-Year Cherry Blossom Tree...
We can join forces, and then...
We can change everything...with our power@together...

group_1.textRight: Backpacks, check... Blankets, check...@Water bottles, check...

group_1.textLeft: And you know what else we need? This!@We gotta have some fun while we're there!

group_1.textRight: Oh, a frisbee? Sounds like fun...!

group_1.textLeft: Yep yep!

group_1.textRight: *Giggle* Now we just need to pack a lunch,@and we're all set for our picnic!

group_1.textLeft: Momoko and the others are on their way here!

group_1.textRight: Woah, no way!@We're gonna have hamburg steak there?!

group_1.textLeft: I promised you I would make them, but I just@didn't have time before.
And I was sick the other night, so I couldn't@make it for dinner.
I figured this was the right opportunity.

group_1.textRight: [chara:100501:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]Woohoo! It's the perfect lunch!

group_1.textLeft: Hey, everyone!

group_1.textRight: Ooh, it smells so yummy in here!
C'mon, Rena! Don't drool!

group_1.textCenter: I'm not drooling, you dummy!@Don't act like I'm some glutton!

group_1.textLeft: As much as I want to get going, can you wait a@little longer?
I just finished making lunch, so it needs@some time to cool.

group_1.textRight: Didn't you mention this was a picnic up at the@Rumor of the 1000-Year Cherry Blossom?
It's still morning. We've got plenty of time 'til@we'll eat, so let's take it easy.
Speaking of which, you surprised me when you@came up with this so suddenly.

group_1.textLeft: I know right? Isn't this like what happened with@the observatory before?

group_1.textRight: I heard Kagome sensed Iroha's magic there?

group_1.textLeft: Very astute of you both.
Indeed, we're not just having a picnic today.

group_1.textRight: [chara:100301:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Huh? Really?! I had no idea!
Me neither...
What're we gonna do?![chara:100501:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:100501:cheek_0][chara:100501:face_mtn_ex_010.exp3.json][chara:100501:lipSynch_1]@Are we gonna get to see Iroha?!

group_1.textLeft: That's right. I'll bring Iroha back with the power of@the Rumor of the 1000-Year Cherry Blossom Tree.

group_1.textRight: [chara:100501:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Eh?!@That's... Really...?!
Um, how? Is that even possible?

group_1.textLeft: Of course it is.
The Mirror Witch is within Iroha, holding@the power to transcend time and space.
I'll get her to create a mirror into the past to@reverse the current situation.

group_1.textRight: No, wait! Justâ€•@Hang on a second!
Won't that make a time paradox happen?@Isn't that a serious issue?

group_1.textLeft: We need to go back in time and make sure that@Iroha doesn't sacrifice herself.
If all else fails, I can gather the power to take@her place.
That way, she won't have to leave, and we can@give her a future instead...

group_1.textRight: C'mon, you're not thinking straight.@What's the matter with you, Yachiyo?
You didn't even answer Tsuruno's question.
And I don't know if Iroha will help you@carry this out.

group_1.textLeft: I'm sure Iroha will help me...@So she can live the future she dreams of...

group_1.textRight: There's no way...
Iroha would NEVER allow you to be sacrificed@in her stead.
Um... Would it really be okay for you to@take her place...?

group_1.textLeft: Of course.
If I can bring her back, it's alright to me.

group_1.textRight: Iroha would say just the same thing...!
Even if you somehow pull it off,@Iroha won't help you...

group_1.textLeft: I don't care. I'll make it happen.

group_1.textRight: Yachiyo, seriously, cool your jets...@You're acting wild now...

group_1.textLeft: Don't get in my way!
I was hoping we could all be in this together!@It'd work out perfectly if we were...!

group_1.textRight: [se:7201_detect_magic][chara:100301:effect_ef_adv_01]...Ah! She's dead serious...

group_1.textLeft: Felicia!@Shut her down with your amnesia magic!
If we let her travel into the past,@she might destroy everything!

group_1.textRight: What?! For real?!@I don't really get it, but...!

group_1.textCenter: I'll go to the Rumor of the 1000-Year Cherry@Blossom Tree myself.
